segments.text: I see this kitchen scene and it makes me feel a bit down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so absorbed in her chore, missing everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, ruining the floor slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking risks just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that tilting stool, one wrong move and he'll tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but it's all so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's aware of the dangers building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is lovely, but inside it's heading for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry they'll get hurt and it breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't things just stay safe and simple?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not even be worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed mishap feels so poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they realize before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
